title: when you pat for a skin and it doesnt let you use it, got me again riot
body: why would you take my money and not even let me use the skin i bought. sigh the usual stingy riot

replies.body: Who did you pat? usually you have to use some sort of currency. You cant just go round dishing out back scratches and expect skins to magically appear.

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LcIkOgec,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-09T08:53:17.415+0000)
>
> Who did you pat? usually you have to use some sort of currency. You cant just go round dishing out back scratches and expect skins to magically appear.

He said Pat no back scratch geeze
